meanings.sent1: The airburst lit up the sky with a sudden blast.
meanings.sent2: The scientists studied the airburst caused by the fireworks.
meanings.sent3: The airburst startled the birds, making them fly in all directions.
meanings.sent4: The airburst of laughter erupted from the children playing in the park.
meanings.sent5: The airburst of colors in the sunset painted the evening sky.

meanings.sent1: The fireworks will airburst above the crowd during the celebration.
meanings.sent2: The balloon will airburst when it reaches a certain altitude.
meanings.sent3: The soap bubbles airburst in a burst of tiny rainbows.
meanings.sent4: The excitement in the room seemed to airburst with joy.
meanings.sent5: The tension in the air seemed to airburst with a loud bang.
